name: Sales Person Itemwise Commission
query:
SELECT
	ST.sales_person as "Sales Person:Link/Sales Person:120",
	SI.name AS "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:80",
	SI.posting_date AS "Date:Date:100",
	SI.commission_type AS "Commission Type:Data:140",
	SIT.item_code AS "Item:Link/Item:80",
	SIT.base_rate as "Item Rate:Currency:80",
	SIT.base_amount as "Item Amount:Currency:120",
	SIT.commission_rate AS "Commission Rate:Float:130",
	SIT.commission_rate * SIT.base_amount /100 AS "Commission Amount:Currency:200"
FROM
	`tabSales Invoice` AS SI 
INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` AS SIT
ON SIT.parent = SI.name
INNER JOIN `tabSales Team` AS ST
on ST.parent = SI.name
AND ifnull(ST.allocated_percentage,0) = 100
WHERE
	 ifnull(SI.base_net_total, 0) > 0 and ifnull(SI.total_commission, 0) > 0
ORDER BY SI.posting_date
